ingredients.ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese at room temperature
1 (10.75 ounce) can cream of mushroom soup
2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into 1-inch pieces

cookingTips: Bring cream cheese to room temperature before adding so it blends smoothly without lumps
Stir the mixture occasionally during cooking to ensure even heating and consistent texture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What techniques ensure a creamy, lump-free slow cooker sauce with tender chicken?
